portfolio.title: Adventure Retreat
portfolio.description: A fullstack web application to view, add and rate campgrounds utilising MongoDB, Express, Node, Mapbox API etc

portfolio.title: MoodStream
portfolio.description: An ML based application which detects your emotions based on facial recognition and suggests upto 10 songs based on your mood.

portfolio.title: ATS Resume Expert
portfolio.description: An AI-powered ATS that evaluates resumes against job descriptions and provides feedback as well as match percentages

portfolio.title: CyberGuard Chronicles
portfolio.description: A role-playing game built on Godot 4 to promote cybersecurity awareness.
